SELECT hour(stamp) dt, action, count(action) dtcnt FROM busi_oper WHERE stamp BETWEEN SUBDATE(now(),interval 7 hour) and now()
GROUP BY hour(stamp),action
SELECT sum( count ) actionCnt, action FROM busi_statistics WHERE 1=1 and stamp >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and stamp <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY ACTION

SELECT username idCard, sum( count ) count FROM busi_statistics WHERE 1=1 and stamp >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and stamp <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY username ORDER BY count desc LIMIT 0,5

SELECT src_ip ip, sum( count ) count FROM busi_statistics WHERE 1=1 and stamp >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and stamp <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY src_ip ORDER BY count desc LIMIT 0,5

SELECT dst_code ip, sum( count ) count, '' as name FROM busi_statistics WHERE 1=1 and stamp >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and stamp <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY dst_code ORDER BY count desc LIMIT 0,5

SELECT date_format( stamp, '%H:%i' ) AS minuteTime, count( id ) operCnt FROM ( SELECT id, stamp FROM busi_oper WHERE action <> 10 and action <> 11 and stamp > DATE_SUB( now( ), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE ) ) b GROUP BY minuteTime ORDER BY minuteTime DESC
